TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType

TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType Interface Reference

Provides the behavior and properties of a file type supported by the editor. More...

Inheritance diagram for TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void Compile (string source, TextWriter stdout)
 Compiles the file.
void Execute (string source, ExecutionResult result)
 Execute the source of the file.
bool FileNameMatches (string fileName)
 Checks whether `fileName` appears to be the name of a file of this type.

Properties

bool CanCompile [get]
 Indicates whether the file can be compiled.
bool CanExecute [get]
 Indicates whether the file can be executed.
string FileExtension [get]
 The extenstion of the file type. This is basically the same as the FileNamePattern but without the asterisk.
string FileNamePattern [get]
 The pattern for files that are of this type. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.controls.openfiledialog.filter(VS.95).aspx for the needed form.
Image Icon [get]
 The icon that is associated with this type and is displayed in the GUI (e.g. create file dialog, tab page, ...).
string Name [get]
 A descriptive name that will be used to display this file type to the user in the user interface.

Detailed Description

Provides the behavior and properties of a file type supported by the editor.

Member Function Documentation

void TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.Compile ( string  source,
TextWriter  stdout 
)

Compiles the file.

Parameters:
source Source code to compile.
stdout TextWriter where the results should be written to.

void TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.Execute ( string  source,
ExecutionResult  result 
)

Execute the source of the file.

Parameters:
source Source code to execute.
result ExecutionResult instance that fires events according to the execution state.

Implemented in TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileType, and TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileType.

Checks whether `fileName` appears to be the name of a file of this type.

string TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.FileExtension [get]

The extenstion of the file type. This is basically the same as the FileNamePattern but without the asterisk.

Implemented in TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileType, and TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileType.

string TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.FileNamePattern [get]

The pattern for files that are of this type. See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.controls.openfiledialog.filter(VS.95).aspx for the needed form.

Implemented in TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileType, and TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileType.

Image TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.Icon [get]

The icon that is associated with this type and is displayed in the GUI (e.g. create file dialog, tab page, ...).

Implemented in TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileType, and TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileType.

string TwinEditor.FileTypes.IFileType.Name [get]

A descriptive name that will be used to display this file type to the user in the user interface.

Implemented in TwinEditor.FileTypes.PythonFileType, and TwinEditor.FileTypes.TextFileType.
